identified-content.person: WAND, DR. SAMARA BETH (DR. SAMARA BETH GINZBURG)

block.p: Dr. Samara Beth Wand, the daughter of Marsha Sue and Carl F. Wand of Dix Hills, N.Y., is to be married today to Samuel Joe Ginzburg, the son of Nina and Sol Ginzburg of Smithtown, N.Y. Rabbi William Berman will perform the ceremony at the Woodbury Jewish Center in Woodbury, N.Y.

The bride, 26, is a resident in internal medicine at the Mount Sinai Medical Center in New York. She graduated magna cum laude from the University of Michigan and received a medical degree with honors from the Mount Sinai School of Medicine.

Dr. Samara Beth Wand, the daughter of Marsha Sue and Carl F. Wand of Dix Hills, N.Y., is to be married today to Samuel Joe Ginzburg, the son of Nina and Sol Ginzburg of Smithtown, N.Y. Rabbi William Berman will perform the ceremony at the Woodbury Jewish Center in Woodbury, N.Y.

The bride, 26, is a resident in internal medicine at the Mount Sinai Medical Center in New York. She graduated magna cum laude from the University of Michigan and received a medical degree with honors from the Mount Sinai School of Medicine.

The bridegroom, 32, is the senior managing director of global sales and trading at Gruntal & Company, a New York brokerage firm. He graduated cum laude from the University of Massachusetts at Amherst.
